description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Commands to manage Service Registry in Azure Spring Cloud.

commands.name: az spring-cloud service-registry bind
commands.summary: Bind an app to Service Registry.
examples: az spring-cloud service-registry bind --app MyApp -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring-cloud service-registry show
commands.summary: Show the provisioning status and runtime status of Service Registry.

commands.name: az spring-cloud service-registry unbind
commands.summary: Unbind an app from Service Registry.
examples: az spring-cloud service-registry unbind --app MyApp -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup
